change.item: Encoded in EAD by Jodi Boyle

repository.corpname: M.E. Grenander Department of Special Collections & Archives

did.abstract: These records document the day-to-day activities of the Guilderland (N.Y.) Central Teachers Association.
did.physloc: The materials are located onsite in the department.

bioghist.head: Biographical History
bioghist.p: The Guilderland Central Teachers Association is a local of the American Federation of Teachers with offices in Schenectady, NY. Its members teach in the Guilderland Central School District.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The collection includes contracts, correspondence, salary informsation, pay grade information, a floppy disk on salary data, and administrative files from the Guilderland Central Teachers Association. Also included in the collection are negotiations between the Guilderland Central Teachers Association and their schools, as well as meeting minutes from various meetings held by the Association. The collection also features a seal maker for the Associaton.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Steve Zahurak donated the collection to the M.E. Grenander Department of Special Collections & Archives.2008 April

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: Majority of this collection is unrestricted. Select files noted on the finding aid are restricted. In addition, two folders are closed for seventy-five years because of attorney-client privilege. One folder is closed until 2061 and the other is closed until 2066.

userestrict.head: Copyright
userestrict.p: The researcher assumes full responsibility for conforming with the laws of copyright. Whenever possible, the M.E. Grenander Department of Special Collections and Archives will provide information about copyright owners and other restrictions, but the legal determination ultimately rests with the researcher. Requests for permission to publish material from this collection should be discussed with the Head of Special Collections and Archives.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Preferred citation for this material is as follows:

Identification of specific item, series, box, folder, Guilderland Central Teachers Association Records. M.E. Grenander Department of Special Collections and Archives, University Libraries, University at Albany, State University of New York (hereafter referred to as the Guilderland Central Teachers Association Records).
